text: Maram aduna wasakpiba adu thajabada yumpham oi, wasakpiba adu Abraham-gi charol surol pumnamakta lemna piba khudol oinanabani--madu Wayel Yathang inba makhoisinggidata natte adubu Abraham-na thajakhiba adugumna thajaba makhoisinggisuni. Maram aduna Abraham-di eikhoi pumnamakki thawaigi ipa oire.
